Articles.Content: Not sure if it came out today as I haven't played in two days but sense the new update I've had two more small updates on Xbox, any idea where I can find the patch notes for those? Looked through announcements and had to no luck thanks.

1 hour ago, RIPPASNAPPAS said:

Not sure if it came out today as I haven't played in two days but sense the new update I've had two more small updates on Xbox, any idea where I can find the patch notes for those? Looked through announcements and had to no luck thanks. 

A small patch happened for me too. Was it the 600mb one?

10 hours ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

A small patch happened for me too. Was it the 600mb one?

Yes, and there was another a couple days before that.

12 hours ago, RIPPASNAPPAS said:

Not sure if it came out today as I haven't played in two days but sense the new update I've had two more small updates on Xbox, any idea where I can find the patch notes for those? Looked through announcements and had to no luck thanks. 

Hello there, we have just released a new patch that fixes some bugs. Please let us know if you encounter further issues. 

Patch Notes for 01.05
•    Addressed an issue where users using a French regional setting could experience a crash on load.
•    Addressed an issue where users could lose access to their save when loading during gameplay.

On 4/4/2019 at 12:56 PM, St4rdust said:

Hello there, we have just released a new patch that fixes some bugs. Please let us know if you encounter further issues. 

Patch Notes for 01.05
•    Addressed an issue where users using a French regional setting could experience a crash on load.
•    Addressed an issue where users could lose access to their save when loading during gameplay.

I'm still getting the frozen kerbal eva bug if I transmit data. Thanks alot.
